metadata.name: New Process Created Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects new process creation using WMIC via the "process call create" flag

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wmic.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('process')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('call')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create')))

output.summary: Detects new process creation using WMIC via the "process call create" flag
